data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Haut-Katanga will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, help the 657,499 believers in Haut-Katanga to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Haut-Katanga prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.focus_label: Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary:
the state of Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo has a population of 3,420,500.

We estimate Haut-Katanga has 657,499 people who might know Jesus, 2,477,290 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 285,711 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Haut-Katanga
location.full_name: Haut-Katanga, Democratic Republic of the Congo
